name: World 1-1 (itch) (jeplmr)
description:
My entry for Mapcore's July challenge, Nostalgic Level Up. It's World 1-1 from Super Mario Bros., but done in the style of the Link's Awakening remake. I'm still working on it. Art isn't done yet. Expect a "Finished" build around July 31st. 

I've tested this on an keyboard and an Xbox 360 controller. 

CONTROLS:

Walk - A, D, Arrow Keys; D-Pad on Controller
Jump - Space; Y or A button on controller
Dash/Fireball - Left Shift; X button on controller 
Pause - Escape; Start button on controller

CREDITS: 

Musical Composition - Jonathan Marlin

Everything Else - Justin Palmer

CHALLENGE: 

Challenge name: Nostalgic Level Up
Description: recreate/re-imagine one of these levels in a software of your choice!
Deadline: 2019-07-31 23:59 (GMT)
